trans-unit.source: A factory class for creating <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> objects from Windows NT aliases, e-mail addresses, and security identifiers (SIDs).
trans-unit.target: En klassen för att skapa <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> objekt från Windows NT-alias, e-postadresser och säkerhetsidentifierare (SID).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] All methods in ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory are static and no instance needs to be created.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Alla metoder i ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory är statiska och ingen instans måste skapas.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktorn är dold.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"></xref> object that is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"> </xref> objekt som är associerad med den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> object is used for changing the standard Active Directory schema properties that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> class uses.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration>objektet används för att ändra standardegenskaper för Active Directory-schemat som den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>klassen använder.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration"> </xref> som är associerat med den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> using the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en instans av <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> med det angivna Windows NT-aliaset.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>är en konkret implementering av den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>abstrakt klass som används för åtkomst till Active Directory-funktioner.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Active Directory-Arkiv används vanligtvis för att lagra organisationsinformation för personal.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: Det huvudsakliga syftet med den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>är för att göra frågor mot sådana organisationsinformation för affärsskäl.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: The alias string to create the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den aliassträng som att skapa den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that describes the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: En instans av <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> som beskriver det angivna Windows NT-aliaset.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> using an e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en instans av <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> med hjälp av en e-postadress.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>är en konkret implementering av den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>abstrakt klass som används för åtkomst till Active Directory-funktioner.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Active Directory-Arkiv används vanligtvis för att lagra organisationsinformation för personal.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: Det huvudsakliga syftet med den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>är för att göra frågor mot sådana organisationsinformation för affärsskäl.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address string from which to create the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: E-post-strängen som du vill skapa den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that describes the specified e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: En instans av <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> som beskriver den angivna e-postadressen.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> using a Windows NT <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en instans av <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> med hjälp av en Windows NT <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>är en konkret implementering av den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole>abstrakt klass som används för åtkomst till Active Directory-funktioner.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole></xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: Active Directory-Arkiv används vanligtvis för att lagra organisationsinformation för personal.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: Det huvudsakliga syftet med den <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>är för att göra frågor mot sådana organisationsinformation för affärsskäl.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref> to use to create the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref> för att skapa den <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"></xref> that describes the specified <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En instans av <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole"> </xref> som beskriver den angivna <xref href="System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier"> </xref>.
